participants.introText: “He may be beautiful, but don’t get too close — those petals are hiding punishment! He’s blooming back into the arena to reclaim his crown — make way for Black Rose!”
“He doesn’t talk trash — he crushes it. From the pits of Auckland and built like a freight train, it’s the one, the only, Borris!”
“He spins, he slides, he shreds! This melty brain brings total disorientation to every rotation — Auckland, make some noise for Chain Damage!”
“He doesn’t drive — he dances! This melty brain spins like geometry on caffeine and hits like chaos in motion — it’s the swirling storm called Tessellate!”
“He’s not here to sneak — he’s here to strike! Quick on his feet and ruthless with the hits, he’s out for redemption and ready to rage — this is Fury Fox!”
“He’s not just bringing the hammer — he is the hammer! With power from the gods and strikes from the depths, brace yourself for the storm called Mjolnir!”
“One bot causes problems. Two? They create pure anarchy! These misfits from the North and South have teamed up for maximum madness — it's the tag-team terror of Snollygoster and Ragamuffin!”
“He’ll tuck you in — permanently! From the land of koalas and chaos, this hammersaw monster is here to lull you to your doom — nighty-night from Naptime!”
“He’s not just swinging for points — he’s swinging for pain! Built in Auckland and driven with rage, this bot’s about to throw hands — say hello to Haymaker!”
“He’s carved from timber but built to destroy! This isn’t your grandma’s kitchen — he’s serving up carnage with a side of splinters — it’s the one and only Chef Woody!”
“Every lever needs a pivot — and every fight needs a reckoning! She lifts, she slams, she crushes with precision — here comes the force behind the chaos: Fulcrum!”
This bot’s got more bite than bark — slicing, dicing, and deleting the competition one byte at a time! Make some noise for… KILLABYYYYTE!
“No knives, no spoons — just the sharpest forks in the fight! He’s lifting bots and lifting expectations — it’s time to dine on destruction with OnlyForks!”
“He may look cute, but don’t be fooled — this Aussie export is all killer and no filler. Get ready for eggbeaters, chaos, and mayhem — here comes Perry!”
“The suspense is building… the beat is rising… and now it’s time for the drop! Hold your applause — and your bots — for Drumroll Pls!”
“He’s fast, he’s fierce, and he’s leaving sparks in his wake. You won’t see him coming — but you’ll feel the impact of Blue Blur!”
“When this bot enters the ring, old scores get settled and new grudges are born. He’s here to turn rivalries into wreckage — bring the heat for Bad Blood!”
“From the outback to the outbreak, this Aussie menace brings absolute annihilation. The name says it all — brace yourself for the unstoppable Obliterator!”
“You thought one was bad? These two bring twice the trouble, twice the chaos, and twice the fun. It’s double the danger with Snollygoster and Ragamuffin!”
“From the land of kangaroos and chaos comes a spinner with serious bite — stealthy, deadly, and dangerously adorable — give it up for Perry!”
“She’s not here to play fair — she’s here to flip your world upside down! She’s the hammer and the hinge — make some noise for Fulcrum!”
“This isn’t rest — it’s ruin. He’s cutting deep and coming fast, and if you blink… you’re already dreaming. Lights out — it’s Naptime!”
“Don’t mistake his silence for mercy — this fox is furious and focused, and he’s bringing the heat from Auckland’s underground. Give it up for Fury Fox!”
Spinning at full speed and bringing the pain with every swing — this melty bot from Auckland is ready to rattle the competition! Give it up for… CHAIN DAMAAAAGE!
“From Auckland’s edge to the heart of the arena, this speedster’s spinning to win — blink and you’ll miss Blue Blur!”
“When the other utensils ran, he stayed to scrap. He’s flipping bots and flippin’ mad — sharpen your senses for OnlyForks!”
“From the garden of nightmares and straight into your gearbox — a former champion who fights with grace and grinds with fury — it’s the delicate but deadly Black Rose!”
“Forget steel — he’s made of wood and bad intentions! Cooking up chaos with every collision, fire up the grill for Chef Woody!”
“When the lights go on, this beast goes wild. It’s not finesse, it’s not subtle — it’s just pure power from Borris!”
Locked, loaded, and ready to send the competition sky-high — this vertical spinner is here to take a byte out of anyone in its way! Give it up for… KILLABYYYYTE!
“You hear that? That’s not just drums — it’s doom on delivery! Get your sticks ready and your chassis steady for Drumroll Pls!”
“Spinning, shifting, and tearing it all apart — this puzzle doesn’t solve, it shatters! From the mind of madness, it’s Tessellate!”
“From the corner of the pit comes a punch you won’t see coming! He’s winding up, loading up, and ready to drop jaws — brace for Haymaker!”
“There’s history, there’s hostility, and there’s one bot that thrives on both. Tauranga’s coldest fighter is back to spill some Bad Blood!”
“Lightning? Thunder? Nah, that’s just the sound of this monster winding up! When he swings, the earth trembles — fear the wrath of Mjolnir!”

From the land down under comes the bot they call the most feared in Australia — a horizontal spinner built to shred anything that dares to enter the arena. Driven by James Kirby, make some noise for… OBLITERAAAATOR!

She’s fast, feral, and foaming at the gears. With eyes like embers and blades like fangs, she hunts in silence — then strikes in screams. No cage can hold her, no prey escapes. This isn’t a fight… it’s a feeding frenzy. Make way for the wildfire with whiskers… FURY FOX!

He’s not here to serve — he’s here to slice. With a cleaver in one hand and chaos in the other, he dices dreams and flambés fear. Tonight’s special? Fox stew. Seasoned with spite, seared with steel. Bon appétit, battlers — it’s time to taste defeat from the one and only… CHEF WOODY!
He’s faster than a cyclone in a wind tunnel, slicker than oil on ice — it’s the high-velocity heartbreaker, the turbocharged tempest… BLUE BLUR!

Straight from the cutlery drawer of doom — it’s the bot that makes Gordon Ramsay cry and salad spinners tremble. Those prongs? They're not for pasta, they're for PAIN. He's not plated, he's serrated! So grab your napkins, folks it's about to get messy! The table's set, the forks are flying and the chaos is well done! Give it up for the culinary calamity - OOONLY FOOOORKS

These lil guys are twins, but they aren't identical. One is gonna pin you down while the other cracks through your clavicle. You think you'll be fine by taking one down, but they'll stop at nothing. Put your hands together for SNOLLYGOSTER AND RAGAMUFFIN

If you set this robot loose on a bunch of birds.. the sounds you hear will be only Squawks.... but if you wanted to come dine on destruction, then you've made the right choice, GIVE IT UP FOR ONLY FOOOORKS
You might think he's a little upset, but don't get it twisted, this bot is gonna hit you so hard and leave you wishing you never existed. Give it up for FUUUURY FOX

This bot has strategy- don't let him get behind you or he'll put you in a sleeper hold. And if that don't work, he's taking a hammer through you and putting your lights out COLD. Say goodnight- to NAPTIIIIME
This melty brain will run circles around you- and itself! If you're going up against this bot, then your best bet is to wrestle it. Make some noise and give it up. It's TESSELAATE

This robot is our champion from last event, they've been fighting since time's dawn. And if you're trying to take their crown from them, you're bound to catch their thorns. I can't believe they make me write prose but anyway put your hands together for BLAAAAAAACK ROOOOOOSE

The great mind of Archimedes once said "if you give me a lever long enough and a place to stand and I shall move the world". But this bot doesn't care about that. It has a single focus and that is to send opponents closer to the sun than any robot should come. Ladies and gentlemen, make some noise for FULCRUM!

This bot is like a reactor, once it spins up it's gonna be a chain reaction. He hits so hard you should take some panadol.. or tramadol- yknow- so you can pain manage. Everybody please put your hands together for CHAIN DAMAAAAGE

Excuse me waiter, I'd like to order the chef special- Yeah that's right, I'd like one fight full of destruction please- and make it a goody.. cause it's not like robots grow on trees.. oh except this one. GIVE IT UP FOR CHEF WOODYYY

If you're in the ring but you can't see your opponent you will have to use more of your senses. Take a sniff, taste the air... wait.... Hear that noise? Listen to that baby purrrr. Now MAKE SOME NOISE, and give it up, FOR BLUE BLURRRR
This bot is a bully. It's fuelled on pure hate. Should you run for the hills? No... you should run for a forest... When it comes out the gate, nothing will save you from BORRIS
This thing is named after a mammal, so it's about to get hairy. This mammal also gives milk? So I hope you're not intolerant to dairy.. Give us a big roar and say hello to .... PERRRYYYYY
This bot is gonna leave you in bits and... MORE BITS. They clearly have a good dentist because they can clearly chomp through their enemies! Everybody pleaaase make some noise for KILLABYTEEEE

When this robot outmanoeuvres you and there's nothing you can do cause their driver is so good? That's a Shane... And he's here de Rijk the floor with his opponent. Ohhhhh. no.... This can't be good... Oh that makes sense.. because it's BAAAAAAD BLOOOOOD

The hum of the motors, the whirr of the weapon, and the bang of the drum. This isn't some humdrum nobody who can be bested with ease. They're here to bring the noise, the pain, and the DRUMS. OHHHYEAEAAAAAH It's DRUMROLL PLEAAASE

This. Is the robot that all the other robots are taught by their parents to fear. If you don't go to sleep on time... From all the way across the ditch he's gonna come and get ya! Awwwuer Naur It's OBLITERATORRR!

(story time) They say the dwarven brothers Sindri and Brokkr forged a hammer so powerful they needed to enchant it to protect the unworthy from wielding it. Well.. turns out there is one here who is worthy, and they only made the weapon more appropriate for the time. This is a robot you won't wanna roll near, bring the thunder, for MJOOOOLNIIIIIIIR

In his spare time he mows lawns and spreads the grass out to dry. But in his professional fighting career he's gonna copy and paste the same strategy. He's going to cut you to size and hang you out to dry- it's HAYMAKER
They say that he counted to infinity... Twice! This bot must be the robot Chuck Norris. Everybody, please put your hands together for BORRIS!
This robot doesn't even have a heart, and somehow all that runs through his veins is rage, haemoglobin, and mud. Everybody, please put your hands together for BAAD BLOOOOD

From the depths of the forge and the fury of the storm... wielding the power of the gods and the bite of a thousand blades... it's the hammer that doesn't fall—it spins! With a weapon that strikes like thunder and armor forged for war, brace yourselves for the Norse nightmare... this is Mjolnir!

Look, this is just dining cutlery etiquette. On the right hand side of the dish you can have your knives and spoons et cetera... But the left side and in the BLUE square, that's purely reserved for ONLY FOOOOORKS
Rolling into the arena with a deceptively chill vibe, this may just be the tournaments sleeper bot! Everyone grab your blankets and shhhhhhhhh.... It's naap tiiime
This bot hits HARD- a real armour breaker. You'll feel the arena shake, this bot's an earthquaker. The force of the blow is gonna send you to Jamaica! Everybody give it up foor HAYMAKER

One minibot is going to make some room and push you around- Then the other sends you to the moon and let you splatter on the ground. Seriously, it's gonna hurt- the robot equivalent of a concussion. MAKE SOME NOISE It's Snollygoster and Ragamuffin!

Other bots have hearts of steel- but this bot has a heart of oak! Forget branches and grain, cause he's serving carrots, and pain. You don't think he'd go easy on you, would he? Brace yourselves, for CHEF WOOODYYYYY

With an impressive weapon disc like lightning dipped in cobalt. Rivals get picked apart, till they've got no nuts and nobolts. He'll hit you once, twice, three times- and let that damage recur- Please make some noise and a big welcome to BLUE BLURRRR
They say this thwackbot was chained up in robo prison for committing crazy robo crimes.. But he broke free of his bonds, and now, they're his main weapon! IT'S CHAIN DAMAAAGE

Watch him slice, dice and rearrange his opponents into a mosaic of defeat. Every hit they make they calculate, each opponent they face they dominate, and any rest assured- they'll give us a reason to celebrate. Make some noise! It's TESSELATE!
When this bot boots up, opponents start debugging their strategy, because this machine is programmed for destruction. Coming to battle with blades of vengeance and bytes of fury... it's KILLABYTE!

He's lining up his enemies, then he switches to attack mode. If you come at him with long forks, oof- he's gonna snap those. That double barreled drum spinner... don't let it get THAT close. Ladies and gentlemen, give it up one time for BLACK ROSE.

He's cunning, he's sneaky, he thinks outside the box. He's spinny, he's ANGRYY, he came from the school of hard knocks. They say hell hath no fury, but that's because Team Sly Robotics took it, and used it to fuel FUUURY FOXXXX

With a horizontal spinner the size of your worst nightmare this bot doesn’t just hit—it erases. When it starts spinning, the laws of physics start sweating. Rivals don’t get dismantled—they get deleted. Watch as he turns the battlefield into a scrapyard. Everyone make some noise for OBLITERATOOOOOR
HAHAHAHAaaa my nemesis I finaally caught you!!! You silly little semi aquatic mammal of action-Wait.. is that a robot?! Oh my goodness it's PERRY THE ROBOT!?

From the wild streets of Auckland and the chaotic corners of Christchurch, these two minibots don’t play by the rules—they rewrite them. One’s a bulldozer, the other’s a bruiser, and together they play a symphony of destruction. You’re not facing a robot—you’re facing a rebellion. Get ready for the mayhem, the madness, the mischief... Make some noise, stomp the ground, and scream your lungs out for the anarchic duo —it's SNOLLYGOSTER AND RAGAMUFFIN!

He’s not here to dance — he’s here to detonate! Straight outta Auckland, this horizontal hitter doesn’t jab, he obliterates. When the gloves come off, the blades come out — and you’re about to get chopped, dropped, and rocked! He’s the lawnmower of doom, the concussion king, the one-bot wrecking crew. Make some noise for the knockout artist himself — HAYMAKER!

You feel that tension? That’s not fear — that’s history about to explode! He’s back from Tauranga with a score to settle and a vertical spinner that’s got more grudges than a soap opera. He doesn’t just fight — he feuds. Every hit is personal, every flip is payback, and every opponent is just another name on his list. He’s not here to make friends. He’s here to make wreckage. So get loud, get wild, and let the arena feel the fury — it’s BAAAAAAD BLOOOOOD!!!

He’s not here to smell sweet—he’s here to shred steel. He may look elegant but that split drum spinner is anything but gentle. With the beat of his own drum he danced his way to be the reigning champ. And he's here to write another chapter in crimson. Petals poised, thorns primed, and ready to strike. The Beauty AND the BEAST! Please put your hands together for BLACK ROOOOOSE

From the red dust of the outback to the roar of the arena — this isn’t just a robot, it’s a reckoning!” He’s the nightmare that crawled out of Australia’s scrapyards with a horizontal spinner so savage, it makes steel scream. The battlefield is simply his canvas for carnage. Make some noise, make some chaos! It's time to welcome the most feared bot in Australia! The flattening force from down under — this is OBLITERATORRRR!

Knives? Gone. Spoons? Forget it. This bot came to the table with nothing but forks- and he's serving up chaos! He isn't here just to lift bots- he's here to FLIP THE SCRIPT. With precision prongs and a hunger for havoc, he's the ultimate utensil of destruction. Sharpen your cheers and raise your voices the fastest forks in the land! IT'S ONLY FOOOORKS

Boot up the fear and brace for fragmentation — this bot doesn’t just bite, it devours! With vertical vengeance and a grin that could shred steel, Killabyte is here to crash your system and delete your dreams. Bits? Gone. Bytes? Pulverized. Make some noise for the digital destroyer — KILLABYTE!

He spins, he shreds, he slashes — and now he’s got backup! He was already a menace, but now he’s joined by a blade-toting gremlin on wheels! One whips you with chains, the other pokes holes in your dignity. It’s a tag-team of terror, a duo of destruction, and they’re coming for your chassis! Auckland, scream like your bolts depend on it — it’s CHAIN DAMAGE and MOIST PONY!”

They say Borris once arm-wrestled a hydraulic press… and the press tapped out. He doesn’t dodge hits — he intimidates them into missing. Born in Auckland, forged in chaos, and built like a freight train with a grudge, this bot doesn’t fight fair — it fights legendary. He counted to infinity… twice. He’s the robot Chuck Norris, and tonight, he’s here to crush your dreams. Give it up for the myth, the machine, the menace — BORRIS!

Forged in the heart of a dying star and unleashed from the depths of the storm, this bot doesn’t just swing — it shatters. With the fury of Thor Odinson and the precision of a thousand blades, Mjolnir spins like a tempest and hits like a god.  This isn't just a bot, it's a storm forged in steel! Raise your voices, raise your fists, and welcome the Norse nightmare — MJOLNIR!

He’s faster than a rumor in a small town and hits harder than a caffeine crash at midnight! With a cobalt blue disc that slices through steel like butter, he doesn’t just fight — he vanishes and reappears with vengeance. So sharpen your senses, hold your breath, and listen for the purr… because it’s time to welcome the one, the only — BLUE BLURRRR!

Precision engineered in Whangarei, calibrated for chaos - this isn't just a bot, she's a force multiplier! She rewrites the laws of leverage, she's the hinge of havoc, the hammer of fate! Brace yourselves for the mechanical reckoning: It's FULCRUUM

This isn’t Hell’s Kitchen — it’s the arena of agony, and tonight’s special is pain flambé! He might be wood, but don’t let that fool you — this chef slices, dices, and wedges his way through bots like they’re undercooked risotto. Rivals show up raw, and leave well done. So sharpen your knives and your reflexes. IT’S TIME FOR — CHEF WOOOODYYYYY!

From the neon shadows of the grid comes a bot built for digital domination. With a vertical blade coded for carnage and a mind wired for mayhem, this rogue bot doesn’t just crash systems — it corrupts them. You can’t firewall the fury, and you can’t reboot your way out. Welcome to the end of your runtime — it's- KILLABYTE!

Hold onto your seats and brace for bedlam! From the North and South of Aotearoa, these twin terrors are here to turn the arena into a warzone! One pins you down, the other blasts you sky-high — it’s chaos, carnage, and concussion-level hits! You thought one was bad? These two are a tag-team nightmare! Bring the noise! For SNOLLYGOSTER AND RAGAMUFFIN!

He’s spinning out of control — and dragging you down with him! This melty menace broke out of robo prison and turned his chains into weapons of mass destruction. He’s a blur, a brawler, a ballistic nightmare! If you’re still standing when the dust settles, you weren’t in the arena. Auckland, make some noise for the meltdown master — CHAIN DAMAGE!

You know the name, you've seen the carnage - now brace yourselves! He's cloaked in petals and powered by punishment. That split drum spinner? It’s not decoration — it’s devastation. He’s the beauty, the beast, and the nightmare in full bloom. So scream it loud, let the thorns fly, and welcome the ROBOT RAMPAGE DEFENDING CHAMPION — IT'S BLAAAACK ROOOOOOSE!!!

Forged in fury and fuelled by fear — he’s not just a bot, he’s a warning. They whisper his name in the pits. They flinch when the lights dim. Because when this bot enters the arena, mercy leaves the building. Steel bends, circuits fry, and hope dies. No redemption. No remorse. Just ruin. Make some noise for our grand final CHALLENGER the brutal, the unrelenting, OOOOBLITERAAATOR
